nodes.bodyText: We should probably use a random port here - to avoid any clashes with other tests. Also, is this strictly a unit test, or an integration test?
Let's not use the author's name as test data. Let's stick with Baeldung
Consider using https://www.baeldung.com/junit-5-temporary-directory here for a temp dir, rather then Files.createTempFile unless it's Files.createTempFile we're demoing!
Same here with the my name as test data
Do we need @Nonnull var - can we not just go String::toUpperCase ?

commit.message: BAEL-4749: Use method reference in Predicate.not example
BAEL-4749: Use String::isBlank in Predicate.not example
